items.sentence: We\'re trying to have a serious discussion here.
We\'ve been planning this trip for three months.
It\'s very rude of you to say a thing like that.
Just tell me what you want done and I\'ll do it.
Let\'s put this money aside for our summer trip.
Mary baked three dozen cookies for Tom\'s party.
Tom searched for Mary\'s name in the phone book.
Tom seemed really impressed with Mary\'s speech.
How long have you and Tom been working together?
Why don\'t you tell me what happened last night?
